foreignData.name: Verborgene Jäger
foreignData.text: Wenn einer Deiner Gegner eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder größer kontrolliert und die Verborgenen Jäger eine Verzauberung sind, werden die Verborgenen Jäger zu einer 4/4 Kreatur, die als Bestie zählt.

name: Hidden Predators
originalText: When one of your opponents controls a creature with power 4 or greater, if Hidden Predators is an enchantment, Hidden Predators becomes a 4/4 creature that counts as a Beast.

rulings.text: When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text: When an opponent controls a creature with power 4 or greater, if Hidden Predators is an enchantment, Hidden Predators becomes a 4/4 Beast creature.
